S.2. The Campus has accessible good roads
and pathways.
Cavite State University - Tanza Campus was located at Ph 2 Katuparan Sub. Brgy. Bagtas Tanza Cavite
The campus is also implementing traffic and pathways rules for accessibility of the faculty, students, and visitors.
The entrance and exits support the accessibility of pathways and walking area.
The two major pathways of Cavite State University – Tanza Campus.
